paramInformation.label: OUT_TYPE
paramInformation.description: Define the output type.

options.label: direct load control or normally Open relay

paramInformation.label: STARTUP_OUT
paramInformation.description: Define the output level on startup.

paramInformation.label: OFF_TIMEOUT
paramInformation.description: Time in tenth of second after which the output will be switched Off.

paramInformation.label: ON_TIMEOUT
paramInformation.description: Time in tenth of second after which the output will be switched On.

paramInformation.label: UP_POWER_LOCAL_CONTROL
paramInformation.description: The value used to control the integrated Relay in case of Up Power Event.

paramInformation.label: DOWN_POWER_LOCAL_CONTROL
paramInformation.description: The value used to control the integrated Relay in case of Down Power Event

paramInformation.label: METER_TYPE
paramInformation.description: Defines how positive and negative power is treated

options.label: as is (The device is connected in a bidirectional system and you want to measure consumed and produced energy)
negative value is considered 0 (The device is connected in a bidirectional system, but you are interested only in consumed energy)
positive value is considered 0 (The device is connected in a bidirectional system, but you are interested only in produced energy)
All values are considered positive (The device is connected in a system that only consumes Energy)
All values are considered negative (The device is connected in a system that only produces Energy)

paramInformation.label: CT_TYPE
paramInformation.description: Define the Model of Current Transformer connected to the device

paramInformation.label: UP_POWER_REMOTE_CONTROL
paramInformation.description: The value used to control Up Power Group (where 0 equals OFF and 100 equals ON)

paramInformation.label: DOWN_POWER_REMOTE_CONTROL
paramInformation.description: The value used to control Down Power Group (where 0 equals OFF and 100 equals ON)

paramInformation.label: OVER_VOLTAGE_LIMIT
paramInformation.description: Define the Over Voltage Limit in tenth of volt

paramInformation.label: DOWN_VOLTAGE_LIMIT
paramInformation.description: Define the Down Voltage Limit in tenth of volt

paramInformation.label: UP_POWER_LEVEL
paramInformation.description: Sets the level of Watts beyond which time of permanence above this level is calculated (where 0 equals Up Power Event Disabled)

paramInformation.label: UP_POWER_TYPE
paramInformation.description: Defines if the Up Power is consumed or produced

paramInformation.label: UP_POWER_FIRST_TIMEOUT
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence in seconds above the Up power level after which the First Up Power event occurs

paramInformation.label: UP_POWER_NEXT_TIMEOUT
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence in seconds above the Up power level after which the Next Up Power event occurs

paramInformation.label: DOWN_POWER_LEVEL
paramInformation.description: Sets the level of Watts beyond which time of permanence below this level is calculated (where 0 equals Down Power Event Disabled)

paramInformation.label: DOWN_POWER_TYPE
paramInformation.description: Defines if the Down Power is consumed or produced

paramInformation.label: DOWN_POWER_FIRST_TIMEOUT
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence in seconds below the Down Power level after which the first Down Power event occurs

paramInformation.label: DOWN_POWER_NEXT_TIMEOUT
paramInformation.description: Defines the time of permanence in seconds below the Down Power level after which the next Up Down event occurs

paramInformation.label: PROTECTION_TIME
paramInformation.description: Define the minimum time is seconds, after which an Up/Down Power Event can be triggered again

paramInformation.label: METER_REPORT_MAX_DELAY
paramInformation.description: The Maximum Time in minutes after which the next Meter sequence report will be sent

paramInformation.label: METER_ISTANT_REPORT
paramInformation.description: The percentage of Power change from the last sent report that triggers a new meter report sequence (where 0 equals no report is sent for any power change)

paramInformation.label: REPORT_CONFIG
paramInformation.description: Define which Report scale will be sent. If you want to receive more than 1 scale, the value for the configuration parameter is the sum of the event values (117 to receive all reports)
